subject: RE: Complex environment setup (Re: [junit] Recursive TestRunner)
msgSnippet: Hi, I have overridden junit.textui.TestRunner class, and put a infinite loop in that class. It is to repeat my functional test cases in one GUI. Let me know
messageBody:
Hi,

I have overridden junit.textui.TestRunner class, and put a infinite loop
in that class.
It is to repeat my functional test cases in one GUI.
Let me know what do you think on this, as I am not sure how good or bad
it is.
Here is the code which I changed.

protected TestResult start(String args[]) throws Exception {

//
//
//
while(true)
{
try {
suite= getTest(testCase);
result = doRun(suite, wait);
}
catch(Exception e) {
throw new Exception("Could not create and run test suite:
"+e);
}
}
return result ;
}

Any comments/suggestions are welcome.

Thanks and Regards,
Rakesh.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
